name: pnp-list-formatting-chronological-items
title: Chronological Items
shortDescription: This sample formats your view to look like a chronological timeline.
longDescription: This sample formats your view to look like a chronological timeline.

metadata.value: ms-bgColor-themePrimary, ms-bgColor-neutralQuaternary, ms-borderColor-themeLighterAlt, ms-fontColor-neutralPrimary, ms-fontColor-neutralSecondary, ms-fontColor-neutralTertiary, ms-fontSize-20, ms-fontSize-16, ms-fontSize-14

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
